name: Formbot Online Forms – Drag & Drop Form Builder, Securely Embed Contact Forms
author: formbot.com

sections.description:
Plugin to link your FormBot account to your WordPress site. Directly embed your FormBot forms into your posts and pages with blocks or from the editor. List all your forms, create new forms or edit the existing ones and view all form submissions right from your WordPress admin panel.

Secure, Easy-to-Use Online Form Builder for WordPress
sections.installation:
Upload the Formbot Form Builder plugin to your blog, activate it, and then set up with your FormBot client details.

And you’re done!
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

Release Date – 10 October 2022

  • Initial version
  • Plugin setup page added to enter client id and client secret
  • Listing of forms
  • WordPress custom block added to embed forms
  • Custom editor tool added to choose and embed forms directly to posts or pages

short_description: Embed signup, booking, email, registration, lead gen, signature, & consent forms. Protect and encrypt data. PCI & HIPAA compliance.
